General.Name: Global Net Lease Inc
General.Description: Global Net Lease, Inc. (NYSE: GNL) is a publicly traded real estate investment trust listed on the NYSE focused on acquiring a diversified global portfolio of commercial properties, with an emphasis on sale-leaseback transactions involving single tenant, mission critical income producing net-leased assets across the United States, Western and Northern Europe.
General.Address: 650 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10019
